{{Infobox TV channel | name = C/S Origin | logofile = cs_origin.jpg | logosize = 200px | logoalt = | logo2 = | launch = September 14, 2008 | closed date = July 15, 2009 | picture format = | network = | owner = [[Solar Entertainment Corporation|SOLAR Entertainment]] | sister names = [[ETC (TV channel)|ETC]]
[[Jack TV]]
[[Solar Sports]]
[[Basketball TV]]
[[2nd Avenue]] | slogan = '''Unlock The Truth''' | web = | country = {{PHI}} | broadcast area = {{PHI}} | headquarters = [[Antipolo City]], {{PHI}} | former names = | replaced names = [[Sci Fi Channel (Philippines)|Sci Fi Channel]] }} Solar Entertainment Corporation which also created its sister stations, C/S 9, ETC, 2nd Avenue, Jack TV, BTV, & Solar Sports, '''C/S Origin''' was an entertainment channel owned by [[Solar Entertainment Corporation]]. The flagship channel of '''C/S 9''' (on free TV owned by [[Radio Philippines Network|RPN]]). It shows mostly American crime and suspense dramas, science-fiction, mysteries, reality and investigation. The initial broadcast was launched on September 14, 2008. This newest channel is available on [[Global Destiny Cable]] and [[SkyCable]]. Solar Entertainment had decided "handover"[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eE-vZF-AhhY C/S Origin Handover to C/S9] all programs shown on C/S Origin back to its terrestrial channel, [[C/S 9]], started July 15, 2009. C/S Origin, which was available on [[Global Destiny Cable]] and [[SkyCable]], has now been replaced by Sci Fi Channel (Now with [[Universal Channel (Philippines)|Universal Channel]]) on their respective channel line-up. It is unsure if C/S Origin will return if the new season of PBA will start.{{Or|date=July 2009}} ==Profile== '''C/S''' (better known as '''Crime/Suspense'''), the home of the world's critically acclaimed and award-winning US television series, takes entertainment to the next level with '''C/S Origin'''. The channel that gives you an unparalleled selection of choice programming from the hottest shows to the latest seasons. To the most investigative factuals and blockbuster movies. ==Programming== {{Main|List of shows broadcast by C/S}} ==Reference== ==External links== * [http://www.lyngsat.com/mea3.html Solar Entertainment Channels at Lyngsat.com] {{programs}} {{Philippine cable channels}} [[Category:Solar Entertainment Corporation]] [[Category:Television in the Philippines]]
